message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $15,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $13,500?
Hi Bob, I understand your position.  I can come down a bit to $14,000. I'm confident this product will bring you a great return on your investment.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, could we possibly settle on $13,800 for the product?
